archdesc.bioghist: Ann Arbor chapter of charitable and support organization of mothers of men serving in the U.S. Navy during World War II.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, 1942-1947; correspondence; cash book, membership records, sheet music of club song, and bylaws and rituals booklet.
